QuestData.Title: Return to the Ghostlands
QuestData.Description:
Such power! Surely not even Vorath can withstand the might of this weapon now.
We have what we came to the Shadowlands for. The ranseur is ready.
Let's get back to Lady Liadrin in Tranquillien. I hope we're not too late to make a difference!
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Lady Liadrin in Tranquillien.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lady Liadrin in Tranquillien.
